Skip to Main Navigation Skip to Main Content Skip to Footer THE LODGE ALLEY INN™ Charleston, SC Explore Gallery Information Area Map The Lodge Alley Inn™ 195 East Bay Street Charleston, SC 29401 843.722.1611 Club Resort Club Resorts are typically developed and/or managed by the Bluegreen family of companies. Each resort is held to the high Bluegreen standards for accommodations, amenities, service and hospitality. The Heritage Collection 44° F / 7° C Current Weather What you'll love about The Lodge Alley Inn™ Take a step back in time with a stay at The Lodge Alley Inn in the heart of old Charleston, the cultural capital of the South, where layers of history await your discovery. The resort is actually a collection of 18th century warehouses that have been lovingly restored to preserve their history while also providing guests with all the modern-day comforts and conveniences. Accommodations at the resort include cozy studios, larger 1-bedroom suites and lofts for up to 4 guests, and spacious 2 bedroom town homes that can sleep up to 6 guests. This Charleston landmark reflects its rich European heritage with its original pine floors and red brick walls, thick Oriental carpets, period reproductions and intimate parlors with fireplaces. The Victorian-style suites blend old-world charm in the common living areas with a boutique accommodations experience. The Lodge Alley Inn is conveniently located just steps from Charleston Harbor, the Market and Rainbow Row. Once the valet parks your car, let our concierge arrange a historic walking tour or a horse-drawn carriage to take you around town. For a four-star meal and an extensive wine selection, dine at the neighboring High Cotton restaurant, a winner of Wine Spectator’s Award of Excellence since 2003. After dinner, take a leisurely stroll around the historic district or just unwind in the courtyard and chat by the fountain. Upon returning to your room, relax in the ambience of Charleston’s long history, ascend a spiral staircase to a cozy loft, or climb into a four-poster bed Read More GALLERY The Courtyard at Lodge Alley Inn The Lobby at Lodge Alley Inn Loft Living Room Loft Living Room Loft Living Area Loft Living Area Loft Living Area Loft Living Area Loft Dining Area Loft Kitchen Loft Kitchen Loft Kitchen Loft Bedroom Loft Bedroom Loft Bath Room Courtyard Courtyard Fountain Griffith Building Balcony Charleston Carriage Ride Tour White Point Gardens at the Battery AMENITIES & ATTRACTIONS Resort Amenities Concierge DVD Player Fireplace Laundry Facilities On-Site Security Restaurant(s) Valet Parking Villa Amenities Cable TV Coffee Maker Microwave Refrigerator Area Attractions Downtown Charleston’s Lowcountry Restaurants Fort Sumter National Monument Historic Charleston City Market Museum Mile Parks, Plantations and Gardens Rainbow Row Read More FLOOR PLANS - Dimensions and furnishings may vary Typical Studio 324 SQ FT Typical 1 Bedroom 492 SQ FT Typical 1 Bedroom Suite, 562 SQ FT Typical 1 Bedroom Loft 750 SQ FT 2 Bedroom Townhome 790 SQ FT IMPORTANT NOTES Minimum age for check-in: 21 Check-in: 4 p.m. ET Check-out: 10 a.m. ET Office hours: 24 hours Nearest airport: Charleston International (CHS) Miles to resort: 13 Pet policy: No pets allowed. For more information, please . click here Pre-check in: We welcome Guests arriving prior to 4pm. Guests may pre-register with the Front Desk on their day of arrival after 12 noon, unload luggage, and utilize our Valet Service. When their room is available, the Resort will call the Guest's cell phone. Pre-registration helps avoid the long waits at 4pm. Smoking policy: No smoking inside, including electronic cigarettes. Subject to $300 fine Parking: Owners, $40/night, non-Owners, $50/night. public parking garage at 1 Cumberland St. : Valet: Nearest self-park option: More parking info click here Deposit required: Upon check-in, each reservation requires a major credit card for a $100 Pre-Authorization. Other notes: We cannot guarantee unit placement. Our historic buildings house many unique units, some requiring stairs. Downtown noise is unavoidable, but we do offer white-noise machines, ear plugs, and box fans. No daily maid service, but towel exchange is available. 7+ night stays have a mid-week cleaning option. DIRECTIONS Club Resort Club Resorts are typically developed and/or managed by the Bluegreen family of companies. Each resort is held to the high Bluegreen standards for accommodations, amenities, service and hospitality. The Lodge Alley Inn™ Club Resort 195 East Bay Street Charleston, SC 29401 843.722.1611 Get Directions Resort Map

Here's How Your Offer Works Purchase Lock in today’s low price and travel anytime in the next 12 months. Travel Get ready to experience the Hilton Grand Vacations difference. Explore Membership As part of your vacation, you’ll attend a Hilton Grand Vacations sales presentation. TERMS AND CONDITIONS Vacation package includes accommodations and named presentation incentives only. Transportation, personal expenses, taxes, parking and other expenses are not included. Accommodations are subject to availability at a participating hotel or resort within the Hilton portfolio (retail value of $175-$900/night), except in locations where accommodations at another brand hotel may be offered. Certain restrictions may apply. Accommodation upgrades, stays over weekends, high season, and holidays are limited and may include additional fees. Guests must attend a two-hour timeshare sales presentation and tour on the benefits of ownership with Bluegreen Vacation Club, a part of the Hilton Grand Vacations family of brands. Vacation packages are non-transferable, cannot be combined with other promotional offers. One offer per household. For full Details of Participation, . click here Guests will receive a gift of a $100 or $125 MasterCard Reward Card (retail value of $100-$125) after the timeshare sales presentation. MasterCard is issued by Four Corners Bank, member FDIC, pursuant to a license by MasterCard International Incorporated. MasterCard and the MasterCard brand mark are registered trademarks of MasterCard International Incorporated. Use of this card is subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Card Holder Agreement found at . By accepting, signing or using the card, you agree to the terms of the Card Holder Agreement. As the property of Four Corners Bank the surrender of this card may be required at any time. For account access or customer service, go online to or call (8 0 0 ) 5 5 4 -2 7 0 7. ® www.transcardgift.com www.transcardgift.com
